label: grossLineTotalAmount
comment: A monetary value of the total of all line amounts, excluding line level allowances and charges and taxes, being reported in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value of the total of all line amounts, excluding line level allowances and charges and taxes, being reported in this trade settlement line monetary summation.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at header level, for a trade settlement.
A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at line level, for a trade settlement.
